\n
We’d seen a spin bike online and popped in to see if it was suitable.\nAran who served us was friendly, knowledgeable and professional. He gave us advice without being pushy and we left knowing that we had the right product for our needs. We will definitely be back to look for more home gym equipment
\n
\n
\n
\n
Amanda Robinson
\n
Customer
\n
\n
"},{"content":"
\n
\n
Excellent service. Ordered over the phone and managed to get next day delivery. Couldn't ask for more. Super helpful & polite service. Would definitely recommend.
\n
\n
\n
\n
Andy Burns
\n
Customer
\n
\n
"},{"content":"
\n
\n
Josh has great product knowledge and excellent customer service skills. He demonstrated all the models relevant to me and really helped me make the right decision. Very happy.
\n
\n
\n
\n
Amanda Robinson
\n
Customer
